meanings.definition: A member of a class of 14th-century Japanese mercenary agents who were trained in the martial arts and hired for covert operations such as assassination and sabotage.
meanings.sent1: The ninjas moved silently through the night, unseen by their enemies.
meanings.sent2: I watched a movie about ninjas who could disappear in a puff of smoke.
meanings.sent3: The ninjas tried to sneak past the guard, but one of them accidentally stepped on a squeaky toy.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to blend in with any crowd made her the ninja of social gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ninja in black attire is iconic in popular culture.

meanings.definition: A person skilled in ninjutsu, a martial art characterized by stealthy movement and camouflage.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a ninja in training, learning the art of stealth and agility.
meanings.sent2: The ninja swiftly climbed the wall, disappearing into the shadows.
meanings.sent3: When the lights went out, she jokingly declared herself the office ninja.
meanings.sent4: His ability to blend into any environment made him a ninja of disguise.
meanings.sent5: The ninja's movements were so quick and precise, it was like watching a dance.
